tab1.title: Instructions
tab1.useInstructions: You need to have a UVO (Kia) or Bluelink (Hyundai) account with PIN for your car(s). Add your car as a device in Homey, and fill in the username, password and PIN. ***WIP*** This app is Work In Progress. At this stage only Kia cars in EU work. Hyundai and other regions will be added later
tab1.settingsInstructions: After switching on the engine, use the Homey app to start retrieving live data from the car. In the app settings you can change the live update interval. You can also set 24/7 forced updates, also when the engine is off. WARNING: forced updates will drain your 12V battery.
tab1.ABRPInstructions: In the device settings you can enter the user token from ABRP. Get a user token from the ABRP app. Settings > Detailed > Car model > Car settings > Link Torque > copy the token.
